group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall]...!

group_1.textRight: Y-[flashEffect:flashRed2][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:302300:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]yowch!
Ugh...
(I tried fighting a Witch for the first time@in ages, [wait:1.0][chara:101200:cheek_0][chara:101200:face_mtn_ex_052.exp.json]but it's the same as back then...)
(I can't beat a Witch on my own.[chara:101200:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101200:tear_1][chara:101200:lipSynch_1] I'm@totally useless...)

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall]...!!!

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashRed2][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:101200:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Yaaaaaahhh!
(I gotta get out of here... I gotta escape!)

group_1.textCenter: If I don't do something, I'm gonna run@out of magic. I won't be able to fight...
(I guess I could just use my magic to@steal a Grief Seed again...)
You're responsible for indirectly trying@to kill other Magical Girls.

group_1.textRight: Oh! Over there!

group_1.textLeft: You... Pitiful Kaede...

group_1.textRight: Pitifâ€• Do you have to keep saying that?
Anyway, aren't you the one in trouble today?

group_1.textLeft: You're right... [chara:101200:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]I'm pitiful too.
My Soul Gem is just as tainted as yours@was yesterday...

group_1.textRight: Then it's a good thing I came looking.

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: Here you go!

group_1.textLeft: This's the Grief Seed I gave you@yesterday...

group_1.textRight: I decided I just wouldn't feel right using@it.
So I got some help from my friends.

group_1.textLeft: Sorry...

group_1.textRight: You seem really different today, somehow...

group_1.textLeft: Yesterday I was Phantom Thief Karin, the @Magical Girl. [chara:101200:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101200:cheek_0][chara:101200:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101200:lipSynch_1]Today I'm just Pitiful Karin.
That's my name, by the way. Karin Misono.[chara:101200:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101200:cheek_0][chara:101200:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101200:lipSynch_1]@Thanks for helping me out...

group_1.textRight: I'm Kaede Akino. [chara:101101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101101:cheek_1][chara:101101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:101101:lipSynch_1]Nice to meet you.
But you already knew who I was, right?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, is that her?
So that means you gave her that Grief@Seed back!

group_1.textRight: She seems kinda down in the dumps.[chara:100901:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100901:cheek_0][chara:100901:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100901:lipSynch_1] @Not how I pictured her from your story...

group_1.textLeft: Who are they?

group_1.textRight: They're my friends! [chara:101101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101101:cheek_0][chara:101101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101101:lipSynch_1]The three of us all@fight as a team.

group_1.textLeft: I'm Momoko Togame. I guess I'm kinda the@leader here?

group_1.textRight: I'm Rena Minami.
You look like you got totally crushed.@Guess you and Kaede are similar then, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Don't, Rena... [chara:101101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101101:cheek_0][chara:101101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101101:lipSynch_1]You're being rude to@Karin, you know?

group_1.textRight: What? It's true.

group_1.textLeft: Ah... I get it...
Karin is the same as Kaede.

group_1.textRight: Uh oh. I don't like where this is going...

group_1.textLeft: Karin, if it's too tough to fight alone,@you can always team up with someone.

group_1.textRight: Here she goes again... Always sticking@her nose in.

group_1.textLeft: I can't just ditch her, right?
Team up...with someone? [chara:101200:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101200:cheek_0][chara:101200:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:101200:lipSynch_1]I never even@thought of that.

group_1.textRight: Consider it, okay?
You split the reward, but the hassle's@split too. And the fun is doubled.

group_1.textLeft: But... I...
I want to get strong enough to fight on my@own as a Magical Girl...

group_1.textRight: Then take it one step at a time.
Why don't ya try[chara:101001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101001:motion_100][chara:101001:lipSynch_1] fightin' on our team?

group_1.textLeft: That's right! You can try it with us.
Huh?! Wait a second! Quit deciding this@stuff on your own!

group_1.textRight: Why, do you just want to ditch her?

group_1.textLeft: Mmngh, well...I didn't say that!

group_1.textRight: So that's that.
What do you think, Karin? Wanna come?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...

group_1.narration: I can't do anything other than@steal Grief Seeds from people.
But even Pitiful Karin,@who can't fight on her own...@Might be able to change for the better.
